overview: Blindfold Apolonia Lapiedra - This petite Latina is instantly seduced as Pablo covers her eyes in a blindfold and promises her the ultimate pleasure. Ardent Desire Chiki Dulce - Chiki is enjoying a book, naked in bed. Alberto sees her and knows that he has to have her!  Stairway Carolina Abril - Carolina is lacing her shoes when Alberto comes down the stairs to help her out. She thanks him with a kiss that gets more passionate the longer it continues. Checkmate Silvia Nubi - Silvia and Gabe challenge each other in a game of strip chess; lose a piece, lose a piece of clothing.
title: Ardent Desires
